author: Sarah Mughal Rana
description:
I was sitting in one of my extra classes at Oxford about the Timurid-Mughal dynasty when I learned a lesson that quietly reshaped the way I think about storytelling: the idea of social history. Instead of studying the past as a neat, linear trajectory – an approach that too often reflects an Orientalist, colonial way […]

The post My Obsession with my Dagger Collection – and how that led me to Fantasy Storytelling appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: My Obsession with my Dagger Collection – and how that led me to Fantasy Storytelling
